channel.title: Beginner Needs Help
channel.description:
Hello All,
I have recently download the client and server "Demise Pking".
And, was wondering if someone could point me to some very simple coding tutorials. Because, I couldn't find any real good ones. :( I wanted some tutorials on like how to make areas, portals, where to put them. And, like where to edit like in the server files or the client files. .
Again, sorry for the newbish question, but pleas help me! :D

item.title: Beginner Needs Help
item.dc:creator: @TheMonkeyCreator TheMonkeyCreator
item.description:
@TheMonkeyCreator wrote:

luster xg:

edit the runserver.bat and change the jdk version to your version.

Do I change the jdk version in the runserver.bat?

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Needs Help
item.dc:creator: @luster_xg luster xg
item.description:
@luster_xg wrote:

edit the runserver.bat and change the jdk version to your version.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Needs Help
item.dc:creator: @TheMonkeyCreator TheMonkeyCreator
item.description:
@TheMonkeyCreator wrote:

Thanks for all the help!!!

But, why do you think demise pking is a fail??

And, one reason it is one of the feew that will run. . The others like come up with a cmd then close really fast. . .

Read full topic

@skate0ordie12345 wrote:

most things u edit for will be in client.java and never be shy to make a backup

item.title: Beginner Needs Help
item.dc:creator: @Fluffee Fluffee
item.description:
@Fluffee wrote:

Put it at the bottom of the list. Just scroll down to the end of the list and paste it there.

Fluffee

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Needs Help
item.dc:creator: @TheMonkeyCreator TheMonkeyCreator
item.description:
@TheMonkeyCreator wrote:

[quote=“IfearI, post:6, topic:312215”][quote author=TheMonkeyCreator link=topic=408645.msg3016644#msg3016644 date=1257247740]

I wanted to make a few tutorials on these - but sadly, every single tutorial that I post, doesn’t get accepted. I posted it very nice and neat but it still got denied. They have pretty high expectations so not every single tutorial on almost everything is on here. Guess you’ll just try your hardest, and post your help questions on here (:

Fluffee

Ahhh ok…

Well I guess I’ll ask them right here! Ok first off I go into the client.java in the server files right?

But, where do I go in the .java file to add stuff like npc’s weapons etc… And, how do I add them. Also a lot of the clients, and servers I download won’t work. As in they come up then close really quickly. So, If you could helpp me with that to I would appreciate it well.
[/quote]

With adding npc’s and weapons, you mean to create custom one’s? or do you mean for example add a cow or something on that X & Y?

How to add a NPC:

Open Autospawn
and put this in it.

spawn = 0	3234	3216	0	3235	3217	3233	3215	1	Hans

spawn = ID X Y Height X1 Y1 X2 Y2 WalkType Description[/quote]
Thank you very much! But he real problem I have on adding things is where in the auto spawn do I put it?

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner Needs Help
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

[quote=“TheMonkeyCreator, post:5, topic:312215”][quote author=Fluffee link=topic=408645.msg3016481#msg3016481 date=1257221174]
I wanted to make a few tutorials on these - but sadly, every single tutorial that I post, doesn’t get accepted. I posted it very nice and neat but it still got denied. They have pretty high expectations so not every single tutorial on almost everything is on here. Guess you’ll just try your hardest, and post your help questions on here (:

Fluffee
[/quote]
Ahhh ok…

Well I guess I’ll ask them right here! Ok first off I go into the client.java in the server files right?

But, where do I go in the .java file to add stuff like npc’s weapons etc… And, how do I add them. Also a lot of the clients, and servers I download won’t work. As in they come up then close really quickly. So, If you could helpp me with that to I would appreciate it well.[/quote]

With adding npc’s and weapons, you mean to create custom one’s? or do you mean for example add a cow or something on that X & Y?

How to add a NPC:

Open Autospawn
and put this in it.

spawn = 0	3234	3216	0	3235	3217	3233	3215	1	Hans

spawn = ID X Y Height X1 Y1 X2 Y2 WalkType Description

Read full topic

There’s some beginner tutorials on how to add global objects (like portals) in the tutorial section. I’m not sure if there’s any on how to make the portal actually teleport you somewhere…
